Ich habe den Thread in die internationalen Foren verschoben, da in dem generellen Forumbereich nur Englisch zugelassen ist. Bitte in der Zukunft beachten.

Scheint ethnozentrischen zu mir ...

(pardon mistranslations, google translate was used)

The main forums are international, and English is chosen as the single language to make all content available to the broadest possible audience. All content in languages other than English goes into the "International" subsection, them are the rules.

Please don't continue discussion of this issue in this thread.
